name: Pathfinder Name Generator
description: Roll for initiative... to name your Pathfinder character! Unleash your inner adventurer with our epic name generator, crafting the perfect moniker for your hero or villain. Prepare to embark on a quest of legendary proportions, starting with a name that resonates with power and intrigue!
introduction: Tired of generic names that wouldn't intimidate a goblin? Our Pathfinder Name Generator is here to rescue you from naming doldrums! Whether you're playing a noble paladin, a cunning rogue, or a powerful wizard, we'll conjure up a name worthy of your epic tale. So, grab your dice, sharpen your pencils, and let's forge some legendary identities!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold the magic! We'll present you with a selection of awesome Pathfinder-esque names.
Don't like what you see? No problem! Just keep clicking until you find the perfect name that speaks to your character's soul (or their dark, sinister heart).
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to craft a truly unique name that will make bards sing for ages!
Once you've found THE ONE, copy and paste it into your character sheet and prepare to dominate the Pathfinder world!
Share your amazing find with your party and bask in their envy!

faqs.question: Is this generator only for Pathfinder 1e?
faqs.answer: Nope! While inspired by Pathfinder, these names work great for any fantasy RPG, including Pathfinder 2e, Dungeons & Dragons, and more! Let your imagination run wild!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Pathfinder novels?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider it a gift from the RNG gods to your creative endeavors. Just remember to credit coolnamemaker.com if you become a bestseller (just kidding... unless?)!

faqs.question: Are the names generated truly random?
faqs.answer: Yes, the names are as random as a die roll, but with a sprinkle of fantasy flavor added for extra spice!

faqs.question: Will using a name from this generator guarantee me victory in my Pathfinder campaign?
faqs.answer: A cool name is a powerful weapon! While we can't guarantee victory, it'll certainly intimidate your enemies... or at least make them laugh before you vanquish them.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes and suffixes for the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We love hearing from our users. Send us your ideas, and if they're epic enough, we'll add them to the generator!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Use it as much as you want. Our gift to the Pathfinder community!
